summary: Completed comprehensive testing of extended SaaS Financiero application with all new KPIs and features. Backend APIs working perfectly with 100% success rate. All 28 KPIs implemented correctly including new fields (caja, egresos_totales, utilidad_operativa). Dashboard summary endpoint with filtering, comparative KPIs, and rolling calculations all functional. Frontend integration successful with proper KPI display and user flows.
passed_tests: GET /api/kpis/metadata - returns all 28 KPIs with descriptions
POST /api/data/{company_id} - accepts new fields: caja, egresos_totales, utilidad_operativa
GET /api/dashboard/{company_id}/summary - new endpoint with complete KPIs
Burn rate and runway_meses calculation with new caja and egresos_totales fields
String number conversion and NaN handling in data upload
Frontend user registration and authentication flow
Frontend company creation and dashboard navigation
Frontend KPI sections display: Rentabilidad, Liquidez, Clientes, Adquisicion, Productividad, Crecimiento
Frontend chart tabs functionality including new cashflow chart
Backend-Frontend integration for all financial data operations
JWT authentication and authorization across all endpoints
Data validation and error handling for financial inputs

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (UI flows working, minor timeout on form completion)
